subtasks: Wear appropriate protective clothing including extra protection, apron over protective equipment, and protective eyewear
Properly open pesticide containers to prevent dust release
Clean and sanitize tools (e.g., knife or scissors) used for opening containers
Follow label instructions for correct dosage
Measure pesticides accurately
Pour liquids slowly and carefully to avoid splashes
Maintain safe distance from container during pouring to protect face and eyes

Wear appropriate protective clothing including extra protection, apron over protective equipment, and protective eyewear
Properly open pesticide containers to prevent dust release
Clean and sanitize tools (e.g., knife or scissors) used for opening containers

Pour liquids carefully to avoid splashes
